languages.text: {n}Планета, что была заселена эльдарами еще до Падения, стала одной из арен сражений между торжеством чувственной вседозволенности, царившей тогда среди ксеносов, и аскетичной психической сдержанности. Местный правитель Кессей был просвещен и мудр, но подвержен пороку развращенности. Желая перейти в иную форму существования, он создал механизм, который позволил бы ему захватить тела и мысли всего своего народа. Один из телохранителей царя, Халкион, поднял восстание против тирана и смертельно ранил его, но не успел помешать ему слиться с машиной. Тогда Халкион отдал жизнь, чтобы перенести и свой дух в механизм, где продолжил схватку. Трагичная эта война погубила всех эльдар на планете, но сохранила эхо их душ, а также душ их лидеров.{/n}

{n}The planet, which was inhabited by Aeldari prior to the Fall, at some point became one of the many theatres of the war between sensual excess, the dogma that reigned over the xenos of that time, and ascetic self-restraint. A local ruler, Kessei, was enlightened and wise, yet susceptible to depravity. In his desire to transfer his soul to another form of existence, he created a mechanism that would let him take over the bodies and minds of all his people. One of the ruler's bodyguards named Halchyon rose against the tyrant and mortally wounded him, but could not stop him from merging with the machine. Halchyon then gave his life to bind his own spirit to the device and continue fighting therein. This tragic conflict marked the end of all Aeldari on the planet but preserved an echo of their souls and those of their leaders.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Планета, что была заселена эльдарами еще до Падения, стала одной из арен сражений между торжеством чувственной вседозволенности, царившей тогда среди ксеносов, и аскетичной психической сдержанности. Местный правитель Кессей был просвещен и мудр, но подвержен пороку развращенности. Желая перейти в иную форму существования, он создал механизм, который позволил бы ему захватить тела и мысли всего своего народа. traits.locale_text: {n}The planet, which was inhabited by Aeldari prior to the Fall, one day became one of the many theatres of the war between the triumph of sensual excess that reigned over the xenos of that time and ascetic self-restraint. A local ruler, Kessei, was enlightened and wise, yet susceptible to depravity. In his desire to transfer his soul to another form of existence, he created a mechanism that would let him take over the bodies and minds of all his people. One of the ruler's bodyguards named Halchyon rose against the tyrant and mortally wounded him, but could not stop him from merging with the machine. Halchyon then gave his life to bind his own spirit to the device and continue fighting therein. This tragic conflict marked the end of all the Aeldari on the planet but preserved an echo of their souls and those of their leaders.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在大陨落到来之前，这颗行星曾属于艾达灵族。当时的某个时刻，支配灵族社会的享乐主义与禁欲的自我约束信条之间爆发了战争，这颗行星也沦为艾达灵族内战的诸多战场之一。当地的统治者凯塞开明而聪慧，却轻易地投靠了堕落的势力。他渴望将自己的灵魂转移到其他生物之中，于是他创造了一种机械，可以让他控制所有人的身体和思想。这位统治者手下有一名贴身护卫，名叫哈西恩。哈西恩奋起反抗暴君，给予其致命一击，但却无法阻止暴君与机器的融合。于是，哈西恩献出了自己的生命，将自己的灵魂束缚在这台机器上，继续与暴君进行战斗。这场充满悲剧的大战，最终导致这颗行星所有的艾达灵族一命呜呼，但双方领袖与忠臣臣民的灵魂依然回响在这台机器之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The planet, which was inhabited by Aeldari prior to the Fall, at some point became one of the many theatres of the war between sensual excess, the dogma that reigned over the xenos of that time, and ascetic self-restraint. A local ruler, Kessei, was enlightened and wise, yet susceptible to depravity. In his desire to transfer his soul to another form of existence, he created a mechanism that would let him take over the bodies and minds of all his people. One of the ruler's bodyguards named Halchyon rose against the tyrant and mortally wounded him, but could not stop him from merging with the machine. Halchyon then gave his life to bind his own spirit to the device and continue fighting therein. This tragic conflict marked the end of all Aeldari on the planet but preserved an echo of their souls and those of their leaders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在大陨落到来之前，这颗行星曾属于艾达灵族。当时的某个时刻，支配灵族社会的享乐主义与禁欲的自我约束信条之间爆发了战争，这颗行星也沦为艾达灵族内战的诸多战场之一。当地的统治者凯塞开明而聪慧，却轻易地投靠了堕落的势力。他渴望将自己的灵魂转移到其他生物之中，于是他创造了一种机械，可以让他控制所有人的身体和思想。这位统治者手下有一名贴身护卫，名叫哈西恩。哈西恩奋起反抗暴君，给予其致命一击，但却无法阻止暴君与机器的融合。于是，哈西恩献出了自己的生命，将自己的灵魂束缚在这台机器上，继续与暴君进行战斗。这场充满悲剧的大战，最终导致这颗行星所有的艾达灵族一命呜呼，但双方领袖与忠臣臣民的灵魂依然回响在这台机器之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El planeta, habitado por Aeldari antes de la Caída, se convirtió en algún momento en uno de los muchos escenarios de la guerra entre el exceso sensual, el dogma que reinaba sobre los xenos de la época, y la autocontención ascética. Un gobernante local, Kessei, era culto y sabio, pero susceptible a la depravación. En su deseo de transferir su alma a otra forma de existencia, creó un mecanismo que le permitiría apoderarse de los cuerpos y las mentes de todo su pueblo. Uno de los guardaespaldas del gobernante, llamado Halchyon, se alzó contra el tirano y lo hirió de muerte, pero no pudo impedir que se fusionara con la máquina. Halchyon dio entonces su vida para unir su propio espíritu al artefacto y seguir luchando en él. Este trágico conflicto marcó el fin de todos los Aeldari del planeta, pero conservó un eco de sus almas y las de sus líderes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The planet, which was inhabited by Aeldari prior to the Fall, at some point became one of the many theatres of the war between sensual excess, the dogma that reigned over the xenos of that time, and ascetic self-restraint. A local ruler, Kessei, was enlightened and wise, yet susceptible to depravity. In his desire to transfer his soul to another form of existence, he created a mechanism that would let him take over the bodies and minds of all his people. One of the ruler's bodyguards named Halchyon rose against the tyrant and mortally wounded him, but could not stop him from merging with the machine. Halchyon then gave his life to bind his own spirit to the device and continue fighting therein. This tragic conflict marked the end of all Aeldari on the planet but preserved an echo of their souls and those of their leaders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El planeta, habitado por Aeldari antes de la Caída, se convirtió en algún momento en uno de los muchos escenarios de la guerra entre el exceso sensual, el dogma que reinaba sobre los xenos de la época, y la autocontención ascética. Un gobernante local, Kessei, era culto y sabio, pero susceptible a la depravación. En su deseo de transferir su alma a otra forma de existencia, creó un mecanismo que le permitiría apoderarse de los cuerpos y las mentes de todo su pueblo. Halchyon dio entonces su vida para unir su propio espíritu al artefacto y seguir luchando en él. Este trágico conflicto marcó el fin de todos los Aeldari del planeta, pero conservó un eco de sus almas y las de sus líderes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}失墜前にアエルダリが住んでいたこの惑星は、ある時点で、当時のゼノを統治していた教義である官能的な悦楽と、禁欲的な自制心との間で繰り広げられた戦争の舞台のひとつとなった。とある地方の支配者、ケッセイは、悟りを開いた賢明な人物だったが、邪悪な行為に流されやすかった。自分の魂を別の形態の存在に移したいという願望から、彼はすべての民の肉体と精神を乗っ取る仕組みを作り上げた。この支配者のボディガードの一人であるハルシオンは暴君の彼に立ち向かい、彼に致命傷を負わせたものの、彼が機械と合体するのを阻止することはできなかった。そしてハルシオンは命を捧げ、自らの精神をその機械に縛り付け、そこで戦い続けることにした。この悲劇的な争いは、惑星に住むすべてのアエルダリに終わりをもたらしたが、彼らとそのリーダー達の魂の反響を保った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The planet, which was inhabited by Aeldari prior to the Fall, at some point became one of the many theatres of the war between sensual excess, the dogma that reigned over the xenos of that time, and ascetic self-restraint. A local ruler, Kessei, was enlightened and wise, yet susceptible to depravity. In his desire to transfer his soul to another form of existence, he created a mechanism that would let him take over the bodies and minds of all his people. One of the ruler's bodyguards named Halchyon rose against the tyrant and mortally wounded him, but could not stop him from merging with the machine. Halchyon then gave his life to bind his own spirit to the device and continue fighting therein. This tragic conflict marked the end of all Aeldari on the planet but preserved an echo of their souls and those of their leaders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}失墜前にアエルダリが住んでいたこの惑星は、ある時点で、当時のゼノを統治していた教義である官能的な悦楽と、禁欲的な自制心との間で繰り広げられた戦争の舞台のひとつとなった。とある地方の支配者、ケッセイは、悟りを開いた賢明な人物だったが、邪悪な行為に流されやすかった。自分の魂を別の形態の存在に移したいという願望から、彼はすべての民の肉体と精神を乗っ取る仕組みを作り上げた。この支配者のボディガードの一人であるハルシオンは暴君の彼に立ち向かい、彼に致命傷を負わせたものの、彼が機械と合体するのを阻止することはできなかった。そしてハルシオンは命を捧げ、自らの精神をその機械に縛り付け、そこで戦い続けることにした。この悲劇的な争いは、惑星に住むすべてのアエルダリに終わりをもたらしたが、彼らとそのリーダー達の魂の反響を保った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La planète, habitée par les Aeldaris avant la Chute, était à une lointaine époque l'un des nombreux théâtres du conflit qui opposait le dogme de l'excessive sensualité, qui dominait alors la pensée xénos, à celui de la tempérance ascétique. Le seigneur de ce monde, Kessei, était un sage éclairé, mais il pouvait lui arriver de succomber à la dépravation. Mû par le désir d'élever son âme vers une autre forme d'existence, il créa un mécanisme permettant de s'emparer du corps et de l'esprit de tout son peuple. L'un des gardes personnels du souverain, Halchyon, se souleva contre le tyran et le blessa mortellement, mais ne put l'empêcher de fusionner avec la machine. Il décida alors de sacrifier sa propre vie et de lier son esprit à l'appareil, dans le but de continuer à se battre à l'intérieur de celui-ci. Ces événements tragiques entraînèrent la disparition totale des Aeldaris, mais un écho de ce peuple et de ses suzerains demeura sur la planète.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The planet, which was inhabited by Aeldari prior to the Fall, at some point became one of the many theatres of the war between sensual excess, the dogma that reigned over the xenos of that time, and ascetic self-restraint. A local ruler, Kessei, was enlightened and wise, yet susceptible to depravity. In his desire to transfer his soul to another form of existence, he created a mechanism that would let him take over the bodies and minds of all his people. One of the ruler's bodyguards named Halchyon rose against the tyrant and mortally wounded him, but could not stop him from merging with the machine. Halchyon then gave his life to bind his own spirit to the device and continue fighting therein. This tragic conflict marked the end of all Aeldari on the planet but preserved an echo of their souls and those of their leaders.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La planète, habitée par les Aeldaris avant la Chute, était à une lointaine époque l'un des nombreux théâtres du conflit qui opposait le dogme de l'excessive sensualité, qui dominait alors la pensée xénos, à celui de la tempérance ascétique. Le seigneur de ce monde, Kessei, était un sage éclairé, mais il pouvait lui arriver de succomber à la dépravation. L'un des gardes personnels du souverain, Halchyon, se souleva contre le tyran et le blessa mortellement, mais ne put l'empêcher de fusionner avec la machine. Ces événements tragiques entraînèrent la disparition totale des Aeldaris, mais un écho de ce peuple et de ses suzerains demeura sur la planète.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vor dem Fall hatten auf dem Planeten Aeldari gelebt. Irgendwann wurde er zu einem der vielen Schlachtfelder des Kriegs zwischen dem sinnlichen Überschwang — dem damaligen Dogma der Xenos — und der asketischen Zurückhaltung. Ein lokaler Herrscher namens Kessei war erleuchtet und weise, neigte aber zur Verkommenheit. In seinem besessenen Streben, seine Seele in eine andere Form der Existenz zu übertragen, erschuf er einen Mechanismus, durch den er den Körper und den Verstand all seiner Untertanen übernehmen konnte. Eine der Leibwachen des Herrschers, ein Mann namens Halchyon, erhob sich gegen den Tyrannen und verwundete ihn schwer. Er konnte ihn aber nicht daran hindern, mit der Maschine zu verschmelzen. Halchyon gab sein Leben, um seinen eigenen Geist an das Gerät zu binden und in dessen Innerem weiterzukämpfen. Dieser tragische Konflikt markierte das Ende aller Aeldari auf dem Planeten, bewahrte aber ein Echo ihrer Seelen und der ihrer Anführer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The planet, which was inhabited by Aeldari prior to the Fall, at some point became one of the many theatres of the war between sensual excess, the dogma that reigned over the xenos of that time, and ascetic self-restraint. A local ruler, Kessei, was enlightened and wise, yet susceptible to depravity. In his desire to transfer his soul to another form of existence, he created a mechanism that would let him take over the bodies and minds of all his people. One of the ruler's bodyguards named Halchyon rose against the tyrant and mortally wounded him, but could not stop him from merging with the machine. Halchyon then gave his life to bind his own spirit to the device and continue fighting therein. This tragic conflict marked the end of all Aeldari on the planet but preserved an echo of their souls and those of their leaders.{/n}

Irgendwann wurde er zu einem der vielen Schlachtfelder des Kriegs zwischen dem sinnlichen Überschwang — dem damaligen Dogma der Xenos — und der asketischen Zurückhaltung. Ein lokaler Herrscher namens Kessei war erleuchtet und weise, neigte aber zur Verkommenheit. Dieser tragische Konflikt markierte das Ende aller Aeldari auf dem Planeten, bewahrte aber ein Echo ihrer Seelen und der ihrer Anführer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Çöküş öncesinde Aeldarilerin ikamet ettiği gezegen, o dönemdeki zenolara hükmeden dogmadan ve çileci öz kısıtlamadan ibaret olan iki aşırı materyalist uç görüş arasındaki savaşlara tarihin bir noktasında defalarca ev sahipliği yapmış. Yerli bir hükümdar olan Kessei, her ne kadar aydınlanmış ve bilge birisi olsa da günahkârlığa yatkınmış. Ruhunu başka bir varlık biçimine aktarma arzusuyla tüm vatandaşlarının bedenleri ile zihinlerini ele geçirecek bir mekanizma üretmiş. Hükümdarın korumalarından biri olan Halchyon, tirana karşı ayaklanarak ölümcül bir şekilde yaralasa da onun makineyle birleşmesine engel olamamış. Ardından Halchyon, ruhunu cihaza bağlayıp içeride savaşmaya devam etmek için canını vermiş. Bu trajik çekişme, gezegendeki tüm Aeldarilerin sonunu getirse de hem halkın hem de liderlerin ruhlarının bir yankısını korumayı başarmış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The planet, which was inhabited by Aeldari prior to the Fall, at some point became one of the many theatres of the war between sensual excess, the dogma that reigned over the xenos of that time, and ascetic self-restraint. A local ruler, Kessei, was enlightened and wise, yet susceptible to depravity. In his desire to transfer his soul to another form of existence, he created a mechanism that would let him take over the bodies and minds of all his people. One of the ruler's bodyguards named Halchyon rose against the tyrant and mortally wounded him, but could not stop him from merging with the machine. Halchyon then gave his life to bind his own spirit to the device and continue fighting therein. This tragic conflict marked the end of all Aeldari on the planet but preserved an echo of their souls and those of their leaders.{/n}
